Uses of Class
com.complexible.stardog.api.ConnectionConfiguration

Packages that use ConnectionConfiguration
com.complexible.stardog.api Provides the core SNARL (Stardog Native API for the RDF Language) classes and interfaces for programmatic access to the Stardog DBMS. 
com.complexible.stardog.api.admin SNARL API support for Stardog DBMS administration 
com.complexible.stardog.empire Bindings for using Stardog as a DataSource for the Empire library 
com.complexible.stardog.sesame Provides classes for Stardog-Sesame integration
